job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: <br><p>Software Developer (Junior to Intermediate Level)</p><p><br></p><p>Isoprime Corporation is a small software development and consulting firm based in Naperville, Illinois.&nbsp;&nbsp;We provide software technology consulting and packaged software products to serve the healthcare market – primarily hospital-based neonatal intensive care units. </p><p><br></p><p>Job duties include software design, coding, testing, maintenance, and customer support.&nbsp;Being a small company, Isoprime offers the opportunity to experience all facets of software development and get extensive experience with a wide variety of tools.</p><p><br></p><p>Our software products are built using Microsoft technology, including VB.Net and SQL Server, along with other supporting tools such as Crystal Reports.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Job qualifications include classes, training, or experience with an object-oriented programming language such as VB.NET, C#, Java.&nbsp;Experience or extensive training in SQL is also required.&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience or training in Crystal Reports, OLE DB (ADO), and MS Access would be useful.&nbsp;Background in healthcare applications is a plus.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Excellent English-language skills are required, and <u>you must have the permanent legal right to work in the US without sponsorship</u>.</p><p><br></p><p>We are a small company looking for a developer who will take ownership of their work, is eager to learn and grow, and can work well as part of a small team of developers.</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities</p><ul><li>Design, Develop and Test new features for our customers</li><li>Work with customers on implementing and configuring our software</li><li>Answer support calls and emails to help customers troubleshoot problems</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Qualifications</p><ul><li>Experience or training in .NET (or another object-oriented language)</li><li>Knowledge and understanding of SQL and Database Design</li><li>Comfortable working with customers to troubleshoot problems </li></ul><p><br></p><p>Preferred</p><ul><li>BS in Computer Science or related degree</li><li>VB .NET Experience</li><li>Crystal Reports (or other reporting tools) experience</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Benefits</p><ul><li>Competitive Salary</li><li>Participation in all aspects of software development from design to rollout</li><li>Retirement Plan</li><li>Company holidays and paid time off</li></ul>
